ygData.subject: RE: Ding (and assist comment)
ygData.msgSnippet: WOOOOO, Congratz Slyde! Notes on assist: make sure the monk isn t switching targets! I was getting yelled at alot, turned out our monk puller was accidentally
ygData.messageBody:
WOOOOO, Congratz Slyde!

Notes on assist: make sure the monk isn't switching targets! I was getting
yelled at alot, turned out our monk puller was accidentally switching
targets due to the way he has his mouse controls working. It took us all
being in the same room playing to finally figure out what was happening. The
tip on the mob hitting the puller will probably account for the few
mistargets since then.
BTW, ever noticed if you hit assist before the puller is back in melee
range, you will sometimes get a different mob, even on a single pull?

Brilinnia Ban'Sidhe
Excalibur, Xegony
